articles.title: EPL: United drub City 4-2 in Manchester derby
articles.description: Manchester United ended a four-match losing run against Manchester City in style on Sunday, beating their fierce rival 4-2.

articles.title: Sania creates history, becomes World No.1 in doubles rankings
articles.description: Sania Mirza on Sunday created history by becoming the first woman tennis player from India to achieve the world number one ranking in doubles.

articles.title: F1: Hamilton wins Chinese Grand Prix, team-mate Rosberg second
articles.description: Lewis Hamilton put Mercedes back on top in Formula One, leading for most of the race to capture his fourth Chinese Grand Prix victory.

articles.title: IPL 8: Harbhajan blitz takes Mumbai close but Punjab win
articles.description: Harbhajan Singh with his 24-ball 64 took Mumbai Indians close to win as Kings XI Punjab registered a 18-ball win at the Wankhede. Scorecard

articles.title: IPL 8: Hooda stars as Rajasthan seal last-ball thriller
articles.description: Deepak Hooda scored a gutsy half-century as Rajasthan Royals pulled off a close three-wicket win over Delhi Daredevils. Scorecard

articles.title: IPL 8: Gayle takes Bangalore home in nervy chase against KKR
articles.description: Chris Gayle scored a match-winning 96 as RCB chased down KKR's target of 178 to register a three-wicket win. Scorecard
